name: Bombarium
description:
Bombarium is fast-paced action arcade multiplayer game for 2-4 players in deathmatch mode or one player vs monsters in singleplayer mode on several unique battlegrounds. Collect upgrades and power-ups and smash other players or monsters with the bombs in time limit. Player with the most kills at the end win.

In singleplayer mode play against monsters and try to stay alive as long as possible while trying to reach the best score.

Bombarium can be played with friends on single monitor on one keyboard or with gamepads.

Main features

Fast paced action game

Simple game mechanics and controls

8 unique battlegrounds

Several collectible upgrades and power-ups

Play solo or with friends on one PC

Big and devastating explosions

Place a bomb to remove obstacles or to kill monsters or other players

or push the bomb against the enemies

Controls

Player 1: Movement: W S A D, Bomb: Space Bar
Player 2: Movement: Num8 Num5 Num4 Num6, Bomb: Enter
Player 3: Movement: I K J L, Bomb: Right Alt
Player 4: Movement: Up Down Left Right, Bomb: Right Ctrl

Controls can be adjusted in the game in the input settings.

Recommended Hardware

Operating System: Windows 10 64-bit
Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
Memory: 8 GB RAM
Video Card/DirectX Version: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
XInput compatible Gamepad
